title: Positive August Jobs News, Turmoil at Tesla, Trump Claims Inner Circle ‘Treason’
itunes:title: Positive August Jobs News, Turmoil at Tesla, Trump Claims Inner Circle ‘Treason’
description:
Chris Lu,Former Deputy Secretary of Labor, and Lara Rhame,

Chief U.S. Economist at FS Investments, break down the August jobs report and

the outlook for the U.S. economy. Dana Hull, Bloomberg Tech Reporter, and JohnThompson, CEO at Vilas Capital Management, discuss Tesla’s accounting and HR executives leaving the company. Justin Sink, Bloomberg News White House Correspondent, talks about President Trump facing another set of revelations that call into question the loyalty of his administration. And we Drive to the Close of the market with Brian Gildea, Global Head of Investments at Hamilton Lane. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan b

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
